name: Rolling Torment
description:
A platformer prototype was produced in 32 hours over a week in 2021. 

Theme: Van Gogh Art-Style

Controls Base

W/A/S/D    = Move around in the scene

L. Shift    = To pick up the Boulder

R    = Restart to last checkpoint

O    = Restart Level

P    = Back To Menu

Spacebar    = Jump

With the Boulder

Mouse    = Aim the boulder.

Mouse Left Click (hold)    = Charge up force.

Mouse Left Click (release) = Throw boulder.

4-3 Aspect Ratio Team Programmers:

Michael Jordan

Rachael Colaco

William de Beer

Artists:

Fiona Cheung

Peter Nguyen

Roger Painting

William Lawrence
